abstract: The Blackstone Group’s co-founder delivered more than a few zingers at a top Catholic charity dinner on Thursday, picking on politics, Bank of America — and himself.
snippet: The Blackstone Group’s co-founder delivered more than a few zingers at a top Catholic charity dinner on Thursday, picking on politics, Bank of America — and himself.
lead_paragraph: Stephen A. Schwarzman has been many things, including a mergers banker, a private equity mogul and philanthropist.

headline.main: Live From New York, It’s Steve Schwarzman

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
